document_data.name: Parth Melander
document_data.mainbody: '''Parth Melander''' was a [[human]] [[fighter]] and a junior cook at the [[Yawning Portal]] inn in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Parth was a junior cook at the Yawning Portal, working alongside senior cook [[Jarandur Tallstand]]. He made sure to keep a number of big cauldrons of stew simmering at all times.
document_data.Personality: Parth seemed like a younger version of Jarandur, but without the scars and combat skills. Nevertheless, he was quick to protect [[Durnan]]'s family if needed.
